snippet: The work of Ben Rivers, a director of features (“Two Years at Sea”) and shorts (“Slow Action”), is being screened at the New York Film Festival and the Anthology Film Archives.
abstract: Work of director Ben Rivers, including his first feature Two Years at Sea, is being screened at the New York Film Festival and the Anthology Film Archives; Rivers gravitates toward people on the margins of civilization as his subjects, and has produced more than 20 short and medium-length works in the past decade.
lead_paragraph: The work of Ben Rivers, a director of features (“Two Years at Sea”) and shorts (“Slow Action”), is being screened at the New York Film Festival and the Anthology Film Archives.

headline.seo: Ben Rivers’s ‘Two Years at Sea’ and ‘Slow Action’
headline.main: Dreams of Utopia, Dreams of Solitude
headline.print_headline: Dreams of Utopia, Dreams of Solitude
